DOC.brief_summary: The project study auditory deficit congenital amusia behavioral neurophysiological level . The auditory process investigated pitch discrimination , short-term memory , sound-induced emotion . To characterize auditory deficit amusic population , neuropsychological assessment combine neurophysiological marker ( Electro-encephalography : EEG , Magneto-encephalography : MEG , Magnetic Resonance Imaging : MRI ) .
